task: Create integration tests for web-fetch with different providers

test_scenarios: Web-fetch with Gemini as active provider
Web-fetch with OpenAI as active provider
Web-fetch with Anthropic as active provider
Fallback to direct fetch for private IPs
Additional scenarios for input validation and error handling
key_features: Proper provider mocking for different configurations
Behavioral tests verifying tool works with any active provider
No 'any' types used - full TypeScript compliance
